timeline.raw_data: {"type": "email", "timestamp": "2025-07-22T14:45:52", "sender_email": "sanchez.arnel@gmail.com", "recipient_email": "mahmudul.h@amberstudent.com", "subject": "Re: Hi Arnel, amber is here to help you book your ideal student home in London! Let's go!", "message": "Hi Mahmudul,\\n\\nThank you for responding. I\u2019ve just a few questions about the accommodation before I book:\\n\\n1. Can the rent payments be made monthly? This is because I receive my scholarship stipend monthly.\\n\\n2. What is the precise breakdown of the rental price? I\u2019d like to know what are the costs that are included in the price of the rent.\\n\\n3. Term 1 starts on 22 September 2025. Can the term of the lease contract start on 19 Sept 2025 and end on 21 July 2026?\\n\\nThank you in advance for your assistance,\\n\\nArnel Sanchez\\n\\nOn Tue, 22 Jul 2025 at 6:53\u202fPM, <[mahmudul.h@amberstudent.com]()> wrote:\\n\\nHi Arnel,\\n\\nHope you're doing great!\\n\\nI'm Mahmudul, your Booking Manager at Amber, and I\u2019ll be helping you with your student accommodation in London.\\n\\nFollowing are the details of the property you have shortlisted. You can fill out the form to initiate your booking process:\\n\\n[https://ucl.studentacco.com/places/chapter-kings-cross-london-1707293068339/form?url=mahmudul.h%40amberstudent.com&lead_uuid=d851045b-f409-459f-98d5-b6f612ff0e78&lead_id=3084658&email=sanchez.arnel%40gmail.com&inventory_id=2014868&tenancy_id=2014868&config_name=Bronze%20Studio%20Shared%20Lower%20Level&room_id=2014867&lease_duration=51%20week&user=5-jpV2YOW09cVRMsFTVnZFxkGUdcbmBtciBUY3FnbWuBKjUscHlud3sySzSGdYN5f32TSHyOi4OLYIiPhI2RVIqXlkxXTpCdpJ6lpKyTmKWbnVt0XXJwYGtisaqysqpogWp0gH6FfoSCh4qHhImIeNQ&bookform_source=crm_filled_ndc]()\\n\\nNeed help? \u2013 Reach out via call, email, or message - or just let me know a good time to connect.\\nSpots fill up fast, so be sure to act quickly once you get the offer!\\nThanks again for choosing Amber - we\u2019re excited to get you all set for your stay.\\n\\n[amberstudent.com]\\n\\nMahmudul H\\n\\nSenior Operations Associate\\n\\nPhone: [+447897026561]()\\n\\nWhatsapp: [+447782694334]()\\n\\nEmail: [mahmudul.h@amberstudent.com]()\\n\\nWebsite: [amberstudent.com]()", "snippet": "Hi Mahmudul, Thank you for responding. I've just a few questions about the accommodation before I book: 1. Can the rent payments be made monthly? This is because I receive my scholarship stipend", "direction": "inbound", "sender_type": "student", "agent_email": "mahmudul.h@amberstudent.com", "student_email": "sanchez.arnel@gmail.com"}

We will be able to find you something much more closer than this one. But if you have this budget only and you're waiting for some other option, that is not possible. So, Ariel, what do you want to do?
Speaker A: Yeah, let me think about it some more. Very convincing, I must say. And of course, I realize I need to be more realistic, but let me just think about it some more.
Speaker B: And yeah, while you think about it, please check the website. All right. Please check the website. If we can. If you can find something which I think it is not. Should not be possible, but even if you find something which is a little bit closer and more convenient to you, just. Just share me the property name and I'll book that one for you. Okay? Don't worry. There's no pressure. Just I want to help you find the best home for you.
Speaker A: Yeah? Yeah.
Speaker B: All right. Take care. It was lovely talking with you. Have a great day. Okay?
Speaker A: Thank you so much.
